Templates

Document Templates

Ready-to-use templates for common business and technical documents

Available Templates

Our templates help you create professional documents quickly and consistently. They include security policies, project documentation, presentations, and more.

Security Policy Template

A comprehensive security policy template covering all major security domains in accordance with industry standards like ISO 27001.

Security Policy

Available formats:

Word PDF Markdown

Project Documentation Template

A structured template for technical project documentation, including requirements, architecture, testing, and deployment sections.

Project Documentation

Available formats:

Word PDF Markdown

Risk Assessment Template

A structured template for conducting and documenting risk assessments, including risk identification, analysis, and treatment plans.

Security Risk

Available formats:

Excel PDF

Incident Response Plan Template

A comprehensive incident response plan template covering preparation, identification, containment, eradication, recovery, and lessons learned.

Security Incident Response

Available formats:

Word PDF Markdown

Quarto & Typst Templates

Academic & Technical Writing Templates

We offer specialized templates for academic and technical writing using Quarto and Typst:

Quarto Manuscript Template

A ready-to-use template for creating technical papers and research manuscripts with Quarto, supporting multiple output formats including HTML, PDF, and MS Word.

Features:

  • Professional academic styling
  • Citation and bibliography support
  • Code integration for data science
  • Multiple output formats
Download Template

Typst Technical Report Template

A professionally designed Typst template for technical reports and documentation with modern typography and layout.

Features:

  • Clean, modern design
  • Optimized for technical content
  • Customizable styling
  • Fast compilation
Download Template

Using Our Templates

These templates are provided in multiple formats to accommodate your workflow. They include placeholders and guidance to help you create professional documents quickly.

Customization Tips

  1. Branding: Replace placeholder logos and colors with your organization’s branding
  2. Content: Update sections to reflect your specific needs and requirements
  3. Legal Review: Have legal counsel review policy templates before implementation
  4. Version Control: Track changes and maintain version history for all documents

Template License

All templates are provided under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License, which means you can use, modify, and distribute them freely with attribution to chen.ist.
